original_title: Gary Numan: When the Sky Came Down (Live at The Bridgewater Hall, Manchester)
overview: Gary’s sold out show with The Skaparis Orchestra at The Bridgewater Hall, Manchester. The setlist includes songs from his highly successful ‘Savage’ album and classic tracks including the No.1 single ‘Are ‘Friends’ Electric?’, with the DVD capturing the full breathtaking concert for fans to relive again.
title: Gary Numan: When the Sky Came Down (Live at The Bridgewater Hall, Manchester)
